item.title: Web Scraping the Magic Formula Website
item.description: Motivation: For a general use, if you want to keep track of information on a website that you have an account on, and periodically receive an email with an excel file with that same information, then this notebook should serve as the basis to do that job. The Process: In this project in particular, I use Python to automate the following actions: • Going to the Magic Formula Investing Website, and perform a login with my account
